meanings.definition: A large American wild cat with a plain tawny to grayish coat.
meanings.sent1: Cougars are skilled hunters in the wild.
meanings.sent2: I saw cougars at the zoo during my visit.
meanings.sent3: The cougars in the forest were having a meeting about their next hunt.
meanings.sent4: The cougars' stealth and agility make them formidable predators.
meanings.sent5: The sight of cougars roaming freely in nature is truly majestic.

meanings.definition: A woman in her 40s or 50s who actively seeks the casual companionship of younger men.
meanings.sent1: She is known in our group as the cougar who always attracts younger guys.
meanings.sent2: Cougars enjoy socializing with younger men at trendy bars.
meanings.sent3: The cougar at the party was the life of the event, charming everyone around her.
meanings.sent4: In the dating scene, she is like a confident and alluring cougar on the prowl.
meanings.sent5: The confident cougar exuded elegance and charisma wherever she went.
